translation.en: OH, MY! FUCK! LOOK WHO IT IS, MAN!
translation.es: -No entiendo. -Qué mal. ¡Mierda! Mira quién es. Es él.

translation.en: RIGHT THERE. RIGHT OVER THERE. IS THAT HIM?
PUT YOUR GUN AWAY! THERE´S PEOPLE EVERYWHERE!
translation.es: Guarda el arma, hay gente por todos lados.

translation.en: - PUT YOUR FUCKING GUN AWAY! - TAKING HIM OUT.
PUT YOUR GUN DOWN, MAN. I´M SERIOUS.
translation.es: Guarda el arma. ¿En serio? ¿Quieres que te arresten?

translation.en: YOU WANT TO GET ARRESTED?
YOU GUYS, LEAVE US ALONE.
translation.es: Déjennos en paz. -¡Suelta al perro! ¡Déjalo ahí!

translation.en: LEAVE HIM THERE! WALK AWAY FROM THE DOG!
translation.es: Déjennos en paz. -¡Suelta al perro! ¡Déjalo ahí! -Aléjate del perro. -¡Suelta al perro, pendejo!

translation.en: RELEASE THE DOG, ASSHOLE!
LEAVE US ALONE! - RELEASE THE DOG! - PUT THE FUCKING DOG DOWN!
RELEASE HIM!
PUT THE FUCKING GUN DOWN! PUT IT DOWN!
PUT IT DOWN!
- PUT THE FUCKING GUN DOWN! - PUT THE GUN DOWN!
MY NAME IS JULIAN.
translation.es: CENTRO CORRECCIONAL VAN ALLEN EN LAS AFUERAS DE HALIFAX, NUEVA ESCOCIA

translation.en: TODAY IS A SPECIAL DAY BECAUSE I´M FINALLY GETTING OUT OF PRISON.
translation.es: Me llamo Julian. Hoy es un día especial, al fin saldré de prisión.

translation.en: I´VE BEEN LOOKING FORWARD TO THIS DAY FOR THE PAST 18 MONTHS.
translation.es: Hace 18 meses que espero este día.

translation.en: MY NAME´S RICKY, AND I´VE BEEN IN HERE FOR ABOUT 18 MONTHS NOW.
translation.es: Me llamo Ricky, y hace 18 meses que estoy aquí.

translation.en: I´M GETTING OUT TODAY, THANK FUCK.
WELL, YOU GUYS ARE GONNA GET TO KNOW RICKY, I THINK.
AND, UH, BECAUSE I KNOW YOU GUYS
translation.es: Conocerán a Ricky, sé que también quieren seguirlo,

translation.en: WANT TO FOLLOW HIM AROUND, AS WELL, WHICH IS COOL.
translation.es: sé que también quieren seguirlo, y está bien.

translation.en: I TELL YOU ONE THING, TONIGHT I AM GETTING DRUNK AT JULIAN´S.
translation.es: Les diré algo, esta noche me embriagaré en la casa de Julian

translation.en: AND IT´S GONNA BE AWESOME.
IF YOU GUYS WANT TO COME TAPE IT, THAT´S FINE, BUT WE ARE GONNA GET REALLY DRUNK.
translation.es: Si quieren venir a filmar, está bien, pero estaremos muy ebrios.

translation.en: IT´S GONNA BE WICKED.
HOPEFULLY THERE´LL BE A BIT OF DOPE AROUND, TOO.
I´VE BEEN, LIKE, KIND OF LIKE A TEACHER TO HIM, I GUESS.
translation.es: He sido como un maestro para él,

translation.en: AND I´M SICK OF TEACHING HIM.
I´M GONNA GET OUT OF PRISON.
I´M GONNA MOVE BACK TO THE TRAILER PARK.
translation.es: y volveré al parque de caravanas.

translation.en: I´M GONNA LIVE A GOOD, CLEAN LIFE. I´VE MATURED NOW.
translation.es: Llevaré una vida buena y limpia. He madurado.

translation.en: THINGS ARE GONNA BE TOTALLY DIFFERENT.
I DO BLAME RICKY. OF COURSE I DO.
LIKE, EVERYBODY KNOWS THAT HE´S THE REASON WHY I WENT TO JAIL IN THE FIRST PLACE.
translation.es: Todos saben que fui a prisión por él.

translation.en: YOU KNOW, RICKY DOESN´T THINK.
SO, YOU KNOW, I´M NOT GONNA HANG OUT WITH HIM ANYMORE.
translation.es: No pasaré más tiempo con él.

translation.en: I´M JUST GONNA LOOK OUT FOR NUMBER ONE, WHICH IS ME.
translation.es: Cuidaré al número uno, que soy yo.

translation.en: NO MORE RICKY.
JULIAN CAN FRIG OFF IF THAT´S WHAT HE´S TELLING YOU
translation.es: Si Julian les dijo eso, que se vaya a la mierda,

translation.en: ´CAUSE IT´S NOT MY FAULT. IT´S JULIAN´S FAULT WE WENT TO JAIL.
translation.es: porque no es mi culpa, fuimos a prisión por su culpa.

translation.en: HE´S THE ONE FORCE- FEEDING ME DRUGS AND EVERY OTHER GODDAMN THING.
translation.es: Él me obligó a consumir drogas y otras cosas.

translation.en: IT´S NOT MY FAULT.
SO, YOU KNOW, IF THAT´S WHAT HE SAYS, THAT´S FINE.
IT DOESN´T MATTER ANYWAY, BECAUSE THE COUNSELORS TOLD ME
translation.es: No importa, porque los consejeros me dijieron

translation.en: IT´S SOCIETY´S FAULT, NOT MY FAULT.
translation.es: que es culpa de la sociedad, no mía.

translation.en: AND IF JULIAN´S GONNA BE LIKE THAT, THEN FINE.
translation.es: Si Julian va a estar así, bien,

translation.en: I´M GONNA BLAME IT ON HIM,
´CAUSE IT´S HIS FAULT HE WENT TO JAIL THREE TIMES.
translation.es: es su culpa que fuéramos a prisión tres veces.

translation.en: I DON´T NEED JULIAN ANYMORE.
RIGHT ON, MAN. I THOUGHT YOU LEFT.
NO, NO, NO, RICKY, GET YOUR OWN CAB.
translation.es: No. Ricky, busca tu propio taxi.

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU TALKING ABOUT?
YOU´RE GETTING YOUR OWN CAB. YOU´RE NOT SHARING MY CAB.
translation.es: Tú busca tu propio taxi. No compartirás mi taxi. Vete.

translation.en: GET OUT OF HERE.
WE´RE JUST GOING BACK TO THE TRAILER PARK! YOU GOT ANY MONEY?
translation.es: -Solo iré al parque de caravanas. -¿Tienes dinero?

translation.en: - NO, THAT´S WHY I NEED A RIDE. - WELL, GET YOUR OWN CAB.
translation.es: -No, por eso necesito que me lleven. -Bien, busca tu taxi.

translation.en: THAT´S THE WAY YOU WANT TO TREAT ME, IS IT, ON- CAMERA? ON TV?
translation.es: ¿Así quieres tratarme frente a la cámara?

translation.en: HERE´S YOUR BAG.
DON´T THROW MY SHIT.
COULD YOU GUYS TURN THAT OFF?
IF YOU´VE EVER BEEN IN JAIL BEFORE,
THERE´S NOTHING BETTER THAN GETTING OUT OF JAIL AND COMING HOME.
translation.es: no hay nada mejor que salir de prisión y volver a casa.

translation.en: GEE, SHE´S GOTTEN BIGGER.
RICKY AND JULIAN?
WELL, FOR THE MOST PART, THEY´RE RESPONSIBLE
translation.es: SR. LAHEY SUPERVISOR DEL PARQUE DE CARAVANAS En gran parte, son responsables

translation.en: FOR RUINING THIS TRAILER PARK.
translation.es: de haber arruinado este parque de caravanas.

translation.en: USED TO BE PEACEFUL AND QUIET HERE.
translation.es: Solía ser un lugar tranquilo y pacífico.

translation.en: YOU KNOW, WHAT GETS ME MOST IS, ALL THE YOUNG KIDS LOOK UP TO THEM.
translation.es: Lo que más me molesta es que los chicos los admiren.

translation.en: I MEAN, I GOT KIDS FLYING AROUND HERE THROWING BOTTLES AT PEOPLE,
translation.es: Hay chicos corriendo por aquí, arrojando botellas a la gente, plantando marihuana, pinchando neumáticos,

translation.en: GROWING DOPE, SQUEALING TIRES,
translation.es: arrojando botellas a la gente, plantando marihuana, pinchando neumáticos,

translation.en: JUMPING MOTORCYCLES OVER TRAILERS.
translation.es: haciendo volar motocicletas sobre las caravanas...

translation.en: THE LIST GOES ON.
AND I´VE BEEN PARK SUPERVISOR HERE FOR GOING ON 16 YEARS.
translation.es: Hace casi 16 años que soy supervisor.

translation.en: I´VE SEEN IT ALL, BUT THOSE TWO,
translation.es: Lo he visto todo, pero esos dos, en especial, Ricky,

translation.en: PARTICULARLY RICKY, THEY´RE THE WORST.
translation.es: Lo he visto todo, pero esos dos, en especial, Ricky, son los peores.

translation.en: GIVE ME YOUR SMOKES, GORDON. GIVE ME YOUR FRIGGIN´ SMOKES.
translation.es: Dame tus cigarrillos, Gordon. Dame los malditos cigarrillos.

translation.en: YOU OWE ME 15 BUCKS, MAN!
COME ON, I KNOW YOU´VE GOT SOME SMOKES HERE SOMEWHERE.
translation.es: Vamos, sé que tienes cigarrillos aquí.

translation.en: OKAY, RICKY, LET HIM UP!
- RICKY, OFF! - COME ON.
GET OFF HIM, MAN! LET GO OF HIS FOOT.
- GIVE ME YOUR SMOKES, MAN! - LET HIM GO, RICKY!
GET OUT OF HERE. RICKY!
- FRIG OFF, RANDY! - RANDY, BACK OFF.
- YOU FRIG OFF! - BACK OFF! STAY CLEAR!
WHAT WAS IT LIKE IN JAIL, HEY, BUDDY?
WHERE´S JULIAN, RICKY? WHERE ARE YOU STAYING, RICK?
AT THE FUCK- OFF HOTEL, LAHEY.
translation.es: En el Hotel Vete a la Mierda, Lahey.

translation.en: HAVE SOME RESPECT HERE. MR. LAHEY´S THE PARK SUPERVISOR.
translation.es: Sé respetuoso. El Sr. Lahey es el supervisor del parque.

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU, HIS NEW ASSISTANT? YES, I AM!
WELL, THAT´S PRETTY FUCKED UP!
translation.es: RANDY - ASISTENTE DEL SUPERVISOR DEL PARQUE DE CARAVANAS Eso es una mierda.

translation.en: - THIS IS RICKY´S GIRL. - I MISSED YOU.
I MISSED YOU, TOO.
IS RICKY OUT OF JAIL, TOO?
ARE YOU GONNA COME AND VISIT MY MOMMY?
UH, I DON´T KNOW. MAYBE.
YOU´RE OUT OF JAIL. YOU´VE GOT NO PLACE TO LIVE?
translation.es: Saliste de prisión, ¿no tienes dónde vivir?

translation.en: I GOT PLENTY OF PLACES TO LIVE.
I COULD STAY AT ANY ONE OF THESE TRAILERS
translation.es: Podría quedarme en cualquier caravana, le gusto a la gente.

translation.en: ´CAUSE PEOPLE HERE LIKE ME, NOT LIKE YOU DICKS, ALL RIGHT?
translation.es: Podría quedarme en cualquier caravana, le gusto a la gente. No como ustedes, idiotas.

translation.en: THINGS HAVE CHANGED, RICK.
THINGS HAVE CHANGED, HAVE THEY?
translation.es: Las cosas han cambiado. -Las cosas han cambiado, ¿no? -Sí.

translation.en: YEAH, YOU´RE GONNA HAVE TO KEEP YOUR NOSE CLEAN, RICKY.
SMOKES -- LET´S GO. GIVE ME SOME SMOKES.
I´VE ONLY GOT TWO LEFT. I´M NOT GIVING YOU ANY.
translation.es: Solo me quedan dos, no te daré ninguno.

translation.en: YOU´RE A FUCKING DICK.
AND, LAHEY, YOU CAN GO FUCK YOURSELF, OKAY?
translation.es: Y, Lahey, vete a la mierda.

translation.en: STAY OUT OF MY BUSINESS.
translation.es: No te metas en mis asuntos.

translation.en: WHAT A FREAKING JERK, MAN.
RICKY´S BACK.
NICE. THIS IS WHERE I LIVE.
YOU KNOW, LEAVE THIS PLACE FOR 18 MONTHS
translation.es: Me fui 18 meses, dejé que Cory y Trevor se quedaran,

translation.en: AND LET CORY AND TREVOR STAY HERE, AND LOOK WHAT THEY DO.
translation.es: Me fui 18 meses, dejé que Cory y Trevor se quedaran, y mira lo que hicieron.

translation.en: WHEN JULIAN GETS BACK, IT´S GONNA BE SO COOL.
THE WHOLE CREW´S GONNA HANG OUT AGAIN.
translation.es: La banda estará junta otra vez.

translation.en: WE´RE GONNA ROCK THE TRAILER PARK LIKE WE USED TO,
translation.es: Mandaremos en el parque de caravanas como antes.

translation.en: SO WE´RE GONNA CLEAN THE PLACE UP.
IT´S A LITTLE BIT -- IT´S A LITTLE MESSY NOW AND EVERYTHING,
translation.es: Limpiaremos este lugar. Está un poco sucio, pero...

translation.en: BUT WE´VE GOT LOTS OF TIME TO CLEAN IT UP.
WE´LL HAVE IT LOOKING AS GOOD AS IT WAS WHEN HE LEFT.
translation.es: Haremos que se vea tan bien como cuando se fue.

translation.en: WHAT THE HELL HAPPENED TO MY TRAILER, BOYS?
OKAY, CHILL. THERE´S THIS GUY NAMED CYRUS. HE JUST MOVED IN HERE.
translation.es: Tranquilo. Un tipo llamado Cyrus se mudó.

translation.en: THERE´S NOTHING WE COULD DO ABOUT IT.
HE HAS A GUN AND HE´S NUTS.
YEAH, I MOVED INTO HIS TRAILER. NICE LITTLE SPOT.
translation.es: Sí, me mudé a su caravana. Es un lindo lugar.

translation.en: THE WAY I SEE IT, THIS FUCKING JULIAN GUY,
translation.es: En mi opinión, este idiota de Julian

translation.en: HE LOST HIS PRIVILEGES WHEN HE WENT OFF TO CON COLLEGE.
translation.es: perdió sus privilegios cuando se fue a la chirona.

translation.en: YOU SEE, I´M THE GUY THAT OWNS THE TRAILER NOW.
translation.es: perdió sus privilegios cuando se fue a la chirona. Ahora yo soy el dueño.

translation.en: I´M RUNNING THE TRAILER PARK.
translation.es: Yo mando en el parque de caravanas.

translation.en: AND IF THAT BIG, TOUGH, FUCKING GUY COMES RUNNING AROUND HERE
THROWING HIS LITTLE BIT OF WEIGHT AROUND, WELL, THEN FUCK OFF!
translation.es: arrastrando su peso, que se vaya al carajo.

translation.en: WE´LL HELP YOU FIND A NEW PLACE TO LIVE, JULIAN.
translation.es: Te ayudaremos a buscar dónde vivir, Julian.

translation.en: THIS IS MY PLACE, YOU IDIOT!
I´M DISAPPOINTED IN YOU GUYS.
GONE FOR 18 MONTHS -- YOU KNEW I WAS GONNA BE HOME TODAY.
translation.es: Me fui 18 meses, sabían que volvería hoy.

translation.en: SHIT HAPPENS. THIS TIME IT´S NOT OUR FAULT.
translation.es: Lo malo pasa. Esta vez, no es nuestra culpa.

translation.en: SHUT UP!
YOU GUYS LET ME DOWN.
YEAH, MAN, BUT CYRUS, LIKE,
HE KILLED A KID WHEN HE WAS IN REFORM SCHOOL AND SHIT.
translation.es: mató a un chico en el reformatorio.

translation.en: AND HE WAS, LIKE -- GOT EVEN HARDER WHEN HE WAS THERE,
translation.es: Se endureció más cuando estuvo allí.

translation.en: AND HE STOLE CARS, AND HE HAS A 9 MILLIMETER.
translation.es: Robó autos, y tiene una nueve milímetros.

translation.en: AND LAHEY´S AFRAID TO DO ANYTHING
translation.es: Lahey tiene miedo de hacer algo

translation.en: ´CAUSE HE´S WORRIED ABOUT GETTING KNOCKED OUT BY HIM, TOO.
translation.es: porque tiene miedo de que lo mate.

translation.en: IT´S LIKE HE´S THE NEW PARK KING OR SOMETHING, MAN.
translation.es: Es como el nuevo rey del parque.

translation.en: SHIT CHANGES, MAN.
- HE´S NOT EVEN FROM THE PARK. - YEAH, MAN.
HE´S FRONTING TO BE FROM THE PARK,
´CAUSE HE THINKS IT´S COOL TO LIVE IN A TRAILER PARK.
translation.es: porque cree que vivir en un parque de caravanas es genial.

translation.en: SO WHAT ARE YOU GONNA DO? I DON´T KNOW.
BUT I KNOW WHAT YOU GUYS ARE GONNA DO.
YOU´RE GONNA START CLEANING UP THIS MESS.
NOW!
I DON´T THINK WE GOT ANY CLEANERS.
CLEAN IT UP!
WHAT ARE YOU GUYS TAPING IN HERE?
YOU HAVE TO HAVE PERMISSION.
A FRIEND OF MINE´S DOING A DOCUMENTARY. DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT.
translation.es: Un amigo hace un documental, no te preocupes.

translation.en: - ALL RIGHT. - WHAT?
LOOK, I NEED SOME STUFF, AND I COULD ROB YOU
translation.es: Necesito algunas cosas. Podría robarte, o podrías dármelas.

translation.en: OR YOU COULD JUST GIVE IT TO ME --
IT´S UP TO YOURSELF, SO...
- YOU´RE RICKY, RIGHT? - YEAH, MAN.
YOU CAN HAVE WHATEVER YOU WANT. I DON´T CARE.
translation.es: Toma lo que quieras, no me importa.

translation.en: OH, RIGHT ON. GIVE ME FOUR PACKS OF SMOKES. AND I´LL TAKE THESE FLOWERS HERE.
translation.es: Bien. Dame cuatro atados de cigarrillos, y llevaré estas flores.

translation.en: SMOKES! GRAB MY SMOKES THERE.
UH, I WAS IN -- I WAS HERE FIRST, THERE, BUD.
WHAT´S THAT CAMERA DOING HERE?
NONE OF YOUR FUCKING BUSINESS, ACTUALLY.
OBVIOUSLY YOU DON´T KNOW WHO THE FUCK I AM.
translation.es: Es obvio que no sabes quién soy.

translation.en: - OBVIOUSLY YOU DON´T KNOW -- - THE NAME IS CYRUS. CYRUS.
translation.es: -Es obvio que tú no-- -Soy Cyrus. ¡Cyrus! Y me importa un carajo quién eres.

translation.en: AND I DON´T GIVE A FUCK WHO YOU ARE.
translation.es: ¡Cyrus! Y me importa un carajo quién eres.

translation.en: BETTER CHILL OUT THERE, HEAVY METAL DICK.
YEAH? WELL, YOU GO BACK
translation.es: Cálmate, idiota. Vuelve a la bolera de donde saliste, cabeza de casco.

translation.en: TO THE BOWLING ALLEY YOU CAME FROM, HELMET HEAD.
translation.es: Vuelve a la bolera de donde saliste, cabeza de casco.

translation.en: YOU´RE FUCKING LUCKY I´M ON PROBATION! - IS THAT RIGHT? - YEAH. SEE YA!
translation.es: -Te salva mi libertad condicional. -¿En serio? Adiós.

translation.en: THAT´S IT. BYE- BYE!
THAT´LL BE -- WAIT, CYRUS, YOU DIDN´T PAY.
FUCK OFF!
YEAH! YEAH! I´M J- ROC, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
J TO THE R- O- C UP IN THIS.
- THIS HERE´S MY BOY T, TYRONE. - WHAT´S UP, NOW?
translation.es: -Él es mi amigo, T, Tyrone. -¿Qué hay?

translation.en: - THIS HERE´S MR. GREEN. - WHAT´S UP?
AND THAT´S HYDRO IN THE BACK.
DOUBLE CHEESE, NO BACON. FOR REAL, FOR REAL.
A´IGHT. A´IGHT. A´IGHT. PEACE.
HEY, WHAT´S UP?
- WHAT´S UP, MAN? - HEY, MAN.
HOW ARE YOU DOING, TYRONE?
- GOOD TO SEE YOU, MAN. - GOOD TO SEE YOU, MAN.
WELCOME BACK. WHAT´S GOING ON, MAN?
NOT MUCH, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING. WHAT´S GOING ON, MAN?
DOING ALL RIGHT. IT´S ALL GOOD.
SO HOW ARE THINGS GOING?
WHAT´S WRONG?
ME AND T GOT SOME BAD NEWS, G.
translation.es: T y yo tenemos malas noticias, G.

translation.en: YO, CYRUS, MAN.
HE ALL UP IN THIS PARK CONTROLLING ALL THE LIQUOR,
translation.es: Controla el alcohol en el parque,

translation.en: SELLING ALL THE DOPE, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
GOT A GUN, RUNNING AROUND ACTING HARD WITH EVERYBODY.
translation.es: Tiene un arma, y se hace el duro con todos.

translation.en: YOU´RE NOT THE KING OF THE PARK ANYMORE.
translation.es: Ya no eres el rey del parque.

translation.en: BOYS, LISTEN UP, ALL RIGHT?
I´M OUT OF JAIL NOW.
THIS IS MY TRAILER. THIS IS MY HOME.
translation.es: Es mi caravana. Es mi hogar.

translation.en: I´M NOT WORRIED ABOUT CYRUS, ALL RIGHT? DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT.
translation.es: No me preocupa Cyrus. No se preocupen.

translation.en: - COME ON! - A´IGHT. SO WHAT´S GOING ON?
WE DOIN´ ALL RIGHT.
WE BE DOPE WHEN THE NEW N.W.A. COME OUT, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
translation.es: Estaremos geniales para el próximo disco de N.W.A, ¿me entiendes?

translation.en: I HAVEN´T SEEN LUCY AND TRINITY SINCE TRINITY´S 7th BIRTHDAY.
translation.es: No veo a Lucy ni a Trinity desde el séptimo cumpleaños de Trinity.

translation.en: NO, IT WAS HER 8th BIRTHDAY.
NO, NO, IT WAS HER 7th BIRTHDAY, I THINK.
BUT ANYWAY, I WAS IN JAIL FOR HER 7th OR 8th BIRTHDAY,
translation.es: Estuve en prisión para su séptimo u octavo cumpleaños.

translation.en: AND, YOU KNOW, THEY NEVER REALLY GOT A CHANCE TO COME VISIT ME IN JAIL.
translation.es: Nunca pudieron ir a verme a prisión.

translation.en: A YEAR AND A HALF IS QUITE A LONG TIME TO GO WITHOUT SEEING YOUR DAUGHTER
translation.es: Un año y medio es mucho tiempo sin ver a tu hija

translation.en: OR THE WOMAN YOU LOVE, FOR THAT MATTER, I GUESS.
translation.es: o a la mujer que amas.

translation.en: RIGHT ON, BOYS! BUBBLES!
HOW ARE YOU DOING, BUDDY? - IT´S JULIAN. - GOOD TO SEE YOU, MAN.
THAT´S MY BEST FRIEND JULIAN.
WHAT´S UP?
WHAT ARE YOU DOING? HOME FROM JAIL?
translation.es: -¿Qué tal? -¿Qué haces? -Salió de prisión. -Sí, salí hoy.

translation.en: YEAH, GOT OUT TODAY.
WHO´S THIS GUY? WHAT AM I ON THE TV FOR?
translation.es: ¿Quién es él? ¿Por qué estoy en televisión?

translation.en: I´M JUST DOING A LITTLE DOCUMENTARY THING, YOU KNOW.
HOW ARE YOU DOING?
SO WHAT´S GOING ON, ANYWAY?
WELL, I DON´T KNOW IF YOU WERE IN THERE YET,
translation.es: No sé si ya estuviste por ahí,

translation.en: BUT SOME DICKHEAD MOVED INTO YOUR TRAILER.
translation.es: No sé si ya estuviste por ahí, pero un idiota se mudó a tu caravana.

translation.en: I TRIED TO STOP HIM, BUT I COULDN´T. YEAH, CYRUS.
HE KEEPS STICKING A FUCKING GUN IN MY FACE.
translation.es: Siempre me pone el arma en la cara.

translation.en: SEE THIS? ALL RIGHT?
OLD MAN GAVE ME THAT WHEN I WAS IN GRADE 7.
translation.es: Me la dio mi padre cuando estaba en el séptimo grado.

translation.en: SEEN A LOT OF ACTION.
9 MILLIMETER, SAFETY ALWAYS OFF.
translation.es: Vio mucha acción. Nueve milímetros. El seguro nunca está puesto.

translation.en: TOLD ME HE WAS PROUD OF ME ONCE.
translation.es: Una vez me dijo que estaba orgulloso de mí.

translation.en: FUCKING PRICK.
CORY AND TREVOR LET HIM MOVE RIGHT IN. YEAH?
translation.es: -Cory y Trevor dejaron que se mudara. -¿Sí?

translation.en: YOU CAN MOVE IN HERE WITH ME IF YOU WANT.
NO, THAT´S ALL RIGHT. THAT´S, YOU KNOW -- I´M GONNA TAKE CARE OF CYRUS, BUT, YOU KNOW --
translation.es: No, está bien. Me encargaré de Cyrus, pero--

translation.en: I THINK YOU SHOULD. WHAT DO YOU THINK I SHOULD DO?
WELL, I´LL TELL YOU RIGHT NOW. I TALKED TO HIM ALREADY A COUPLE OF TIMES,
translation.es: Hablé con él un par de veces,

translation.en: AND HE´S FUCKING SCARED OF YOU.
HE´S WAITING, WONDERING WHEN YOU´RE COMING HOME.
- YEAH? - YEP.
SO ALL I´VE GOT TO DO IS TELL HIM YOU´RE HERE, AND I BET YOU HE FUCKING BOLTS.
translation.es: Solo debo decirle que estás aquí, y apuesto a que se irá.

translation.en: I DON´T KNOW IF IT´S GONNA BE THAT EASY,
translation.es: No sé si será tan fácil...

translation.en: BUT, YOU KNOW, I JUST GOT TO WATCH IT, MAN.
translation.es: No sé si será tan fácil... Debo tener cuidado.

translation.en: I´M ON PROBATION, AND, YOU KNOW, I´M NOT GOING BACK TO JAIL.
translation.es: Tengo libertad condicional, y no volveré a prisión.

translation.en: YOU WON´T HAVE TO WORRY ABOUT THAT.
EVERYBODY IN THE FUCKING PARK HATES HIM.
LAHEY, EVERYBODY. NOBODY FUCKING LIKES HIM.
translation.es: Lahey, todos... No le gusta a nadie.

translation.en: HE FUCKS EVERYONE OVER. ALL RIGHT.
- COCKSUCKER. - WELL, MAYBE...
YOU KNOW, IF YOU COULD GET WORD AROUND THE PARK
translation.es: Tal vez, puedas hacer correr la voz

translation.en: AND, YOU KNOW, TELL EVERYONE I´M THROWING HIM OUT TONIGHT.
translation.es: y decirle a todos que lo sacaré esta noche.

translation.en: - YEAH, I CAN DO THAT. - YEAH?
- DON´T YOU WORRY ABOUT THAT. - ALL RIGHT.
I´LL GO AROUND DOOR TO FUCKING DOOR IF I HAVE TO.
translation.es: Lo haré puerta por puerta, si es necesario.

translation.en: ENOUGH OF THAT STUFF, MAN. IT´S JUST GOOD TO SEE YOU.
translation.es: Basta de eso. Me alegro de verte.

translation.en: I HEAR YOU´RE RICKY, JULIAN´S LITTLE JAIL BUDDY.
translation.es: Oí que eres Ricky, el amiguito de prisión de Julian.

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU FILMING, MORE EPISODES OF HAPPY DAYS THERE, FONZIE?
translation.es: ¿Qué filmas? ¿Más capítulos de Días felices, Fonzie?

translation.en: LISTEN, JUST GIVE ME YOUR FUCKING SMOKES.
BUDDY, I JUST GOT OUT OF JAIL, ALL RIGHT? I DON´T WANT ANY TROUBLE. PUT THE GUN AWAY.
translation.es: Acabo de salir de prisión. No quiero problemas.

translation.en: I MEAN, YOU´RE ON- CAMERA WITH A FUCKING GUN.
translation.es: Guarda el arma. Estás armado frente a la cámara.

translation.en: I DON´T GIVE A FUCK ABOUT THE CAMERA CREW, OKAY?
JUST GIVE ME YOUR FUCKING SMOKES
OR I´LL PUT A BULLET RIGHT THROUGH YOUR GODDAMN RIB CAGE.
translation.es: o ¡te pondré una bala en el pecho!

translation.en: FOR FUCK´S SAKES!
I´VE GOT FOUR PACKS OF SMOKES, ALL RIGHT?
YOU CAN HAVE TWO OF THEM, ALL RIGHT? NO, FUCKING THANKS.
IF YOU´RE GONNA SHOOT ME OVER TWO PACKS OF SMOKES,
translation.es: Si me matarás por los cigarrillos,

translation.en: THEN GO AHEAD -- SHOOT ME.
IT´S YOUR LUCKY FUCKING DAY, THEN, ISN´T IT, JAIL BOY?
translation.es: Es tu día de suerte, ¿no, preso?

translation.en: YOU TELL YOUR FRIEND JULIAN TO GET THE FUCK OUT OF THE TRAILER PARK,
translation.es: Dile a tu amigo Julian que se vaya del parque de caravanas,

translation.en: OR HE´LL HAVE CYRUS AND YOU KNOW WHAT TO DEAL WITH.
translation.es: o tendrá que lidiar con Cyrus y ya sabes qué.

translation.en: FUCK OFF SOMEWHERE. I´VE GOT WORK TO DO.
I DON´T EVEN HANG AROUND WITH JULIAN ANYMORE.
translation.es: Ya ni siquiera me junto con Julian.

translation.en: WHAT THE FUCK DO YOU THINK YOU´RE DOING?
- WHAT´S THIS? - I´VE COME TO TALK TO LUCY.
translation.es: Vine por Lucy. No te preocupes.

translation.en: DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT. IT´S SOMETHING JULIAN´S DOING.
translation.es: Vine por Lucy. No te preocupes. -Es algo de Julian. -¿Qué es?

translation.en: WHAT THAT JULIAN´S DOING?
SARA, IT DOESN´T MATTER. WHERE´S LUCY? - LUCY´S NOT HERE. - I KNOW SHE´S HERE.
translation.es: -No importa, Sarah. ¿Dónde está Lucy? -No está aquí.

translation.en: SHE WENT TO THE PARK OR SOMETHING. SHE´S NOT HERE.
translation.es: Sé que está aquí. Fue al parque, o algo así, no está.

translation.en: SHE JUST SNUCK OUT THE BACK DOOR? SHE DIDN´T SNEAK.
SHE WALKED OUT THE FRONT DOOR WITH HER DAUGHTER
translation.es: Salió por la puerta, fue con su hija al parque.

translation.en: - TO GO TO THE PARK. - I´M NOT AN IDIOT.
- SARA, WHO´S AT THE DOOR? - NOBODY´S AT THE DOOR.
- LUCY, IT´S RICKY. - THAT´S NOT LUCY.
CAN I TALK TO YOU FOR A MINUTE, PLEASE?
I DON´T WANT YOU TO COME IN, ESPECIALLY NOT WITH ALL THESE PEOPLE.
translation.es: No quiero que entres, sobre todo, con ellos.

translation.en: - COME ON IN, GUYS. - I DON´T WANT YOU TO COME IN.
- DON´T SHOVE ME, SARA. - YOU CAN´T JUST COME BACK HERE
- AFTER 18 MONTHS... - DON´T SHOVE ME.
...AND EXPECT TO JUST WALK BACK IN THE HOUSE LIKE NOTHING HAPPENED, OKAY?
translation.es: y esperar entrar en la casa como si nada.

translation.en: WHAT ARE YOU, HER FUCKING BODYGUARD?
I´M NOT HER BODYGUARD. I´M HER ROOMMATE.
translation.es: No soy su guardaespaldas, soy su compañera.

translation.en: I´M LIVING HERE, HELPING PAY THE BILLS SINCE YOUR ASS WAS IN JAIL.
translation.es: Vivo aquí, ayudo a pagar las cuentas desde que fuiste a prisión.

translation.en: WELL, NOW I´M BACK AND I´M GONNA BE PAYING THE BILLS AROUND HERE.
translation.es: Ahora volví y pagaré las cuentas.

translation.en: THAT´S WHAT YOU THINK!
HOLY SHIT, YOU LOOK GOOD.
I JUST THOUGHT IT WOULD BE NICE TO SPEND SOME TIME TOGETHER.
translation.es: Pensé que sería bueno pasar tiempo juntos.

translation.en: I´VE BEEN IN JAIL FOR 18 MONTHS.
WELL, YEAH, OKAY.
I´M ONLY GONNA BE HERE TO SLEEP ANYWAY, SO DON´T WORRY ABOUT IT.
translation.es: Solo me quedaré a dormir, no te preocupes.

translation.en: YOU´RE KIDDING.
YOU ARE KIDDING, RIGHT? WHAT DO YOU MEAN?
UH, CAN -- KEEP THAT CLOSED.
UM, TRINITY AND I CANNOT HAVE YOU COMING IN AND OUT OF OUR LIVES LIKE THIS.
translation.es: No puedes entrar y salir de mi vida y la de Trinity así.

translation.en: SO JUST GO STAY WITH RAY.
THIS IS MY DAD´S PLACE. SOUNDS LIKE HE´S DRUNK AGAIN, SO...
translation.es: Es la casa de mi papá. Parece que está ebrio otra vez...

translation.en: I LEARNED FROM MY DAD THE BEST THING TO DO WHEN HE´S DRUNK IS TO STAY AWAY.
translation.es: Aprendí de mi papá que lo mejor cuando está ebrio es alejarse.

translation.en: I´D RATHER SLEEP IN THE PLAYGROUND TONIGHT.
translation.es: Prefiero dormir en el parque esta noche.

translation.en: AS MUCH AS I WANT TO GET DRUNK, I´M NOT GOING IN THERE.
THERE COULD BE WOMEN. GOD KNOWS WHAT´S GOING ON, SO...
translation.es: Podría haber mujeres. Dios sabe qué pasa allí.

translation.en: HAVE TO FIND SOMEWHERE ELSE TO GO, BOYS.
10- 8. YOU GOT A 10- 8 THERE?
10- 8? YOU GOT A 10- 2? Randy here. All systems clear.
translation.es: -10-8, ¿tienes un 10-2? -Aquí Randy. Todos los sistemas libres.

translation.en: 10- 4, RANDY.
YOU KNOW, I ORDINARILY DON´T LIKE TO DO THIS,
translation.es: En general, no me gusta hacer esto,

translation.en: BUT I GOT TO CALL THE COPS.
translation.es: pero debo llamar a la policía.

translation.en: THERE´S A POTENTIAL SHOOTOUT
GONNA BE HAPPENING IN THE TRAILER PARK TONIGHT,
translation.es: en el parque de caravanas esta noche,

translation.en: AND -- AND I´M GONNA CALL IN THE HEAVIES.
translation.es: en el parque de caravanas esta noche, y llamaré a los pesados.

translation.en: YOU KNOW, THAT´S REALLY UNFAIR, MR. LAHEY.
JULIAN´S ON PROBATION.
HE COULD GO BACK TO JAIL FOR A REALLY LONG TIME.
translation.es: Podría volver a prisión por mucho tiempo.

translation.en: YEAH, JULIAN´S ON PROBATION.
translation.es: Julian tiene libertad condicional, Cyrus no.

translation.en: CYRUS ISN´T. CYRUS WILL KILL ME.
translation.es: Julian tiene libertad condicional, Cyrus no. Cyrus me matará.

translation.en: YOU GOT ANY BETTER IDEAS?
IF NOT, PUT YOUR SHIRT ON AND SHUT UP.
translation.es: Si no, ponte la camisa y cállate.

translation.en: YOU KNOW, THERE´S A LOT OF DIFFERENT PERSONALITIES
translation.es: Hay muchas personalidades diferentes en este parque de caravanas,

translation.en: HERE IN THIS TRAILER PARK, AND EVERY SINGLE PERSON TRIES
translation.es: Hay muchas personalidades diferentes en este parque de caravanas, y cada uno intenta respetar a los demás,

translation.en: TO RESPECT EACH OTHER, EXCEPT FOR CYRUS.
translation.es: y cada uno intenta respetar a los demás, excepto Cyrus.

translation.en: HE HAS NO RESPECT FOR ANYONE BUT HIMSELF.
translation.es: Solo se respeta a sí mismo.

translation.en: AND I DON´T REALLY WANT TO CALL THE POLICE IN HERE,
translation.es: No quiero llamar a la policía

translation.en: AND CONVINCED MR. LAHEY NOT TO,
translation.es: y convencí al Sr. Lahey de que no lo haga,

translation.en: BECAUSE I FEEL THAT IN THIS COMMUNITY,
translation.es: porque siento que, en esta comunidad,

translation.en: WE SHOULD BE ABLE TO WORK THINGS OUT OURSELVES.
translation.es: deberíamos poder solucionar las cosas entre nosotros.

translation.en: CYRUS AIN´T FROM THE PARK, YOU KNOW WHAT I MEAN?
translation.es: Cyrus no es del parque, ¿me entiendes?

translation.en: ´ROUND HERE, IT´S ALL FOR ALL AND ONE FOR ONE.
translation.es: Aquí es todo para todos, y uno para uno.

translation.en: - THAT´S RIGHT. - YEAH, MAN.
MOTHERFUCKERS WHO AIN´T FROM THE PARK,
translation.es: Los hijos de puta de afuera

translation.en: THEY DON´T UNDERSTAND THE WAY SHIT GOES DOWN,
translation.es: no entienden lo que pasa aquí.

translation.en: LIKE THE J TO THE R- O- C AND LIKE TYRONE DOES, MY MAN HERE.
translation.es: Como J hasta ROC, como Tyrone, mi amigo,

translation.en: - YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING. - YEAH.
WHEN YOU´RE FROM THE PARK, IT´S ALL FOR ONE MOTHERFUCKER
translation.es: Cuando eres del parque, es todos para un hijo de puta,

translation.en: AND ONE MOTHERFUCKER FOR ALL MO´FUCKERS EVERYWHERE,
translation.es: y un hijo de puta para todos,

translation.en: YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
BUT IF YOU COME FROM OUTSIDE THE PARK, YOU BETTER WATCH OUT,
translation.es: Pero si vienes de afuera del parque, ten cuidado,

translation.en: ´CAUSE YOU GOT A WHOLE BUNCH OF PARK HUSTLERS ON YOUR JOCK.
translation.es: porque tendrás un montón de delincuentes tras tu culo.

translation.en: THAT STICK TOGETHER, TOO. IT´S LIKE A FAMILY.
translation.es: Que están unidos. Es como una familia.

translation.en: WELL, YOUR JOCK DON´T STICK TOGETHER,
translation.es: No debemos unir nuestros culos, ¿me entiendes?

translation.en: YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING, BUT THE PEOPLE STICK TOGETHER.
translation.es: No debemos unir nuestros culos, ¿me entiendes? Pero la gente se mantiene unida. De eso hablo.

translation.en: THAT´S THE SHIT I´M TALKING ABOUT.
translation.es: Pero la gente se mantiene unida. De eso hablo.

translation.en: EVERY DAY MR. LAHEY AND I CLEAN UP THIS PLAYGROUND.
translation.es: Todos los días, el Sr. Lahey y yo limpiamos...

translation.en: RANDY, WE HAVE COMPANY.
OH, SHIT, IT´S CYRUS. WHAT´S THIS -- DON´T YOU MOVE!
WHAT´S THIS I HEAR ABOUT YOU CALLING THE COPS, HUH?
WHAT´S THIS I HEAR ABOUT YOU CALLING THE COPS?
NOW, LISTEN, THERE´S PEOPLE WHO LIVE AROUND HERE.
JUST TAKE IT EASY, WILL YOU, CYRUS?
I´LL FUCKING MAKE THE DECISIONS AROUND HERE.
YOU GOT THAT, OLD MAN?
JUST BACK OFF, CYRUS.
TAKE YOUR HANDS OFF ME, SASQUATCH!
NOW, LISTEN -- YOU LISTEN TO ME, OLD MAN.
YOU CALL THE COPS, AND I´LL MAKE AN EXAMPLE OF YOU.
translation.es: Si llamas a la policía, te usaré de ejemplo.

translation.en: YOU UNDERSTAND ME?
WHAT´S THAT SUPPOSED TO MEAN, CYRUS?
BANG! DO I GOT TO SPELL IT FOR YOU?
NOW SAY YOU´RE SORRY.
I´M SORRY.
KISS MY HAND. I´M NOT KISSING YOUR HAND.
translation.es: -Bésame la mano. -No te besaré la mano.

translation.en: KISS MY HAND.
DO IT.
ALL RIGHT, FUCK OFF. I´VE GOT WORK TO DO.
translation.es: Bien, váyanse a la mierda. Tengo trabajo.

translation.en: REMEMBER WHAT I SAID.
OH, MY GOD.
ME AND JULIAN COULD DEFINITELY TAKE CARE OF THE CYRUS THING.
translation.es: Julian y yo podríamos encargarnos de Cyrus.

translation.en: IT´S JUST THAT, NUMBER ONE, WE´RE ON PROBATION,
translation.es: Es que, primero, estamos bajo libertad condicional.

translation.en: WHICH IS NO BIG DEAL, BUT, YOU KNOW, I DON´T REALLY WANT TO GO BACK TO JAIL.
translation.es: No es importante, pero no quiero volver a prisión.

translation.en: AND NUMBER TWO OR THREE OR WHATEVER NUMBER WE´RE ON,
translation.es: Segundo o tercero, o el número que sea,

translation.en: I´M NOT GOING BACK TO JAIL FOR JULIAN
translation.es: no volveré a prisión por Julian

translation.en: BECAUSE I DON´T EVEN HANG AROUND WITH HIM ANYMORE.
translation.es: porque ya no me junto con él.

translation.en: WE´VE GOT TO MAKE A FEW THINGS CLEAR. SURE.
THE TWO OF US CAN´T LIVE IN THIS TRAILER PARK TOGETHER, NOW, CAN WE?
translation.es: No podemos vivir en este parque de caravanas, ¿no?

translation.en: RIGHT, SO I GUESS SOMEONE´S GOT TO MOVE.
translation.es: Sí. Supongo que uno debe irse.

translation.en: THAT´S WHAT I´M TALKING ABOUT.
HEY, THAT´S MY SHIT!
HEY, THAT´S MY SHIT! THAT´S MY SHIT!
OBVIOUSLY YOU DIDN´T HEAR ME WHEN I SAID CLEAR OUT YOUR OWN SHIT.
translation.es: Obviamente, no me oíste cuando dije que sacaras tus cosas.

translation.en: NOW, I WANT A NEW TV.
translation.es: Quiero un televisor nuevo, una videocasetera

translation.en: I WANT A VCR, AND I WANT MY PORN TAPES REPLACED
translation.es: Quiero un televisor nuevo, una videocasetera y quiero que repongas mi pornografía

translation.en: BECAUSE THOSE WERE THE CRÈME DE LA CRÈME.
I WANT YOU OUT OF THIS PARK.
translation.es: Quiero que te vayas de este parque.

translation.en: I´M NOT LEAVING.
translation.es: Quiero que te vayas de este parque. No me iré.

translation.en: I PROVIDE A SERVICE FOR THESE GOOD PEOPLE. THEY´RE LIKE MY FAMILY.
translation.es: Brindo un servicio a esta buena gente. Son como mi familia.

translation.en: TELL HIM, PEOPLE. GO ON.
A SHOW OF HANDS, THOSE WHO NEED HIS DOPE.
translation.es: Levanten la mano los que necesiten su droga.

translation.en: I´D LIKE TO TAKE THIS OPPORTUNITY
TO LET EVERYBODY KNOW THAT ME AND TYRONE´S OPEN FOR BUSINESS.
translation.es: para avisar que Tyrone y yo abrimos el negocio.

translation.en: WE CAN SERVICE ALL YOUR DOPE NEEDS.
GOOD PRICES, TOO, YOU KNOW WHAT I´M SAYING?
SEE, WE DON´T NEED YOU HERE.
WELL, I´M NOT LEAVING. AND I´M NOT AFRAID TO USE THIS GUN.
translation.es: No me iré, y no tengo miedo de usar esta pistola.

translation.en: I THINK YOU´RE AFRAID. FUCK AFRAID!
YOU THINK I WON´T PULL THE TRIGGER?
MY BRAIN TELLS MY FINGER TO PULL THE TRIGGER, AND BOOM!
translation.es: Mi cerebro le dice a mi dedo que jale el gatillo y ¡bum!

translation.en: HAPPENS JUST LIKE THAT.
WELL, LET ME TALK TO YOUR BRAIN, THEN.
HEY, CYRUS´S BRAIN, PULL THE TRIGGER!
translation.es: Cerebro de Cyrus, jala el gatillo.

translation.en: OH, FUNNY GUY.
PULL THE TRIGGER! DO IT! DO IT!
YOU´RE NOT GONNA DO IT, MAN.
CYRUS, YOU FUCKING DICK! SHUT UP!
WHY DON´T YOU DO YOURSELF A FAVOR?
translation.es: ¿Por qué no te haces un favor?

translation.en: YOU´RE NOT FROM THE PARK, MAN. YOU DON´T BELONG HERE. THIS IS MY FAMILY.
translation.es: No eres del parque. No perteneces aquí. Es mi familia.

translation.en: WHY DON´T YOU GET OUT OF HERE?
I DON´T NEED THIS SHIT ANYWAY.
CHUMP CHANGE.
THANKS FOR GETTING RID OF CYRUS FOR US, JULIAN.
translation.es: Gracias por deshacerte de Cyrus, Julian.

translation.en: NOW IF YOU COULD JUST HELP STRAIGHTEN RICKY OUT, WE´D BE ALL SET.
translation.es: Si pudieras ayudar a acomodar a Ricky, sería genial.

translation.en: ALL RIGHT, EVERYBODY, PARTY´S OVER. LET´S GO HOME.
translation.es: ¡Bien, gente! ¡Se acabó la fiesta! A casa.

translation.en: WELCOME BACK, JULIAN.
FUCK OFF, MR. LAHEY!
COME ON, RANDY. LET´S GO WRITE THIS UP.
translation.es: Vamos, Randy, vamos a escribir sobre esto.

translation.en: ALL IN ALL, I THINK WE HAD A PRETTY GOOD DAY TODAY, GUYS.
translation.es: Creo que fue un buen día.

translation.en: IT´S TIME TO HAVE A FEW DRINKS, SIT DOWN, TURN THAT THING OFF.
translation.es: Es hora de beber unos tragos, sentarse y apagar eso.

translation.en: MAN, I´M SORRY TO INTERRUPT YOUR TV SHOW.
translation.es: Lamento interrumpir tu programa de televisión.

translation.en: I´VE GOT NOWHERE TO GO, JULIAN.
ME AND LUCY ARE ALL DONE, AND MY DAD´S DRUNK.
translation.es: Lucy y yo terminamos, y mi papá está ebrio.

translation.en: I WAS JUST WONDERING IF I COULD MAYBE SLEEP IN YOUR CAR
translation.es: Me preguntaba si podía dormir en tu auto.

translation.en: I GOT NOWHERE TO GO.
THANKS, JULIAN.
I CAN´T BELIEVE HE´S STILL OUT THERE.
translation.es: No puedo creer que siga ahí.

translation.en: FOR THE PAST 18 MONTHS,
translation.es: No puedo creer que siga ahí. Los últimos 18 meses me prometí que me alejaría de él.

translation.en: I PROMISED MYSELF TO STAY AWAY FROM HIM.
translation.es: Los últimos 18 meses me prometí que me alejaría de él.

translation.en: I DON´T KNOW. HE´S A GOOD GUY.
translation.es: No sé... Es un buen tipo.

translation.en: TAKE IT EASY, JULIAN. I´M LEAVING.
- RELAX, RICKY, RELAX. - I JUST GOT NOWHERE TO GO.
HERE, I GOT YOU SOME HOT DOGS.
I GOT YOU SOME VODKA.
I APPRECIATE THIS, JULIAN, BUT, I MEAN, I DON´T NEED YOUR CHARITY.
translation.es: Gracias, Julian, pero no necesito tu caridad.

translation.en: RICKY, IT´S OKAY, ALL RIGHT?
HERE, YOU CAN SLEEP IN THE CAR FOR TWO DAYS.
translation.es: Puedes dormir en el auto dos días.

translation.en: THANKS, BUDDY. I APPRECIATE THAT.
I WANT YOU OUT OF THAT CAR IN TWO DAYS, THOUGH, RICKY, ALL RIGHT?
translation.es: Pero quiero que te vayas del auto dentro de dos días, ¿bien?

translation.en: NO MORE THAN TWO WEEKS. I PROMISE, ALL RIGHT?
translation.es: No más de dos semanas, lo prometo.
